document_data.name: Verianthraxa
document_data.mainbody: '''Verianthraxa''' was a [[blue dragon|blue]] [[dracolich]] that laired in [[Anauroch]] along with her mate [[Malygris]] for a time during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, [[Namirrha]] of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] dispatched Verianthraxa and Malygris to assault the [[Citadel of the Raven]] in retaliation for [[Zhentarim]] raids on cult holdings in [[Sembia]]. Malygris' Queen undead form was destroyed, as the Zhent forces were well-prepared for the draconic assault. In the years that followed, Malygris entered into a state of depression and took no interest in anything until meeting [[Shadovar|otherworldy beings]] that were resistant to his tremendous power.
